MACHINE.description: Machine configuration for SSH access and storage

datastore.label: Datastore Path
datastore.description: Path to the datastore directory on the machine

host_entry.label: Host Entry
host_entry.description: SSH known host entry for security verification

ssh_key_configured.label: SSH key already configured
ssh_key_configured.description: Check this if the SSH public key is already installed on the target machine

ssh_password.label: SSH Password (Temporary)
ssh_password.description: Temporary password for initial SSH key setup only. Leave empty if SSH key is already configured. This password is used once to copy the public key and should be removed afterwards for security.

credential.label: Access Password
credential.description: Repository access password (32 characters, alphanumeric + special chars)

name.label: Storage Name
name.description: Unique name for this storage configuration

description.label: Description
description.description: Optional description of this storage configuration

noVersioning.label: Disable Versioning
noVersioning.description: Disable version control for this storage

parameters.label: Additional Parameters
parameters.description: Additional rclone parameters for advanced configuration

ip.label: IP Address
ip.description: IP address of the bridge server

teamDescription.label: Team Description
teamDescription.description: Description of team purpose and responsibilities
